GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles with a count of comments for each. Sorted by date in descending order.

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up a json representation of an article specified by ID number

article.title: Running a Node App
article.author: jessjelly
article.body: This is part two of a series on how to get up and running with Systemd and Node.js. This part dives deeper into how to successfully run your app with systemd long-term, and how to set it up in a production environment.

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves up a json representation of all comments for an article specified by ID number. Sorted by date with the most recent comments first.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Adds a comment for an article specified by ID number. Serves up a json representation of the comment.

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id/.description: Adds / subtracts votes of an article specified by ID number. Serves up a json representation of the updates article.
